content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 59 coal

### Iron Ore Mining Station at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 397 iron ore

### Iron Smelting Area at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0), both fueled with 23 coal each

### Copper Processing Complex at (22, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0)
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 203 copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) fueled with 50 coal
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 51 copper plates
- Multiple burner inserters creating an item transport chain:
  - Inserter at (19.5, 21.5) moving items from drill to chest
  - Inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving items from chest
  - Inserter at (22.5, 20.5) moving items to furnace
  - Inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving finished plates to storage chest

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing transport belts
- Check if the target position is clear before placing belts
- Ensure there are no entities (including the character) standing on the planned belt path
- When creating belt paths, verify that both the source and target positions are free of obstacles

### Entity placement conflicts
- Move away from the target position when placing entities
- Verify that the entire footprint of the entity being placed is clear, not just the center position

### Belt connection issues
- When connecting entities with belts, ensure all intermediate positions are clear
- Plan belt paths to avoid crossing through existing structures or entities
- Consider using longer paths around obstacles if direct paths are blocked
